<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:id="@+id/main"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:background="@color/black"
 android:backgroundTint="#100F10"
 android:backgroundTintMode="add"
 tools:context=".MainActivity">

 <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
 android:id="@+id/constraintLayout2"
 android:layout_width="357dp"
 android:layout_height="470dp"
 android:background="@drawable/loginscreen"
 app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
 app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"

 android:id="@+id/studentElogin"

 <TextView

 app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/studentIDlogin"
 app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/studentIDlogin"

 android:id="@+id/studentIDlogin"

 app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView11" />

 android:id="@+id/studentPASSlogin"

 <Button
 android:id="@+id/button"
